robot.commands.imu.bmi160_regmap.STEP_CONF¶

STEP_CONF = 122¶

magnetometer is accesses via indirect addressing using MAG_IF(5 bytes) register MAG_IF_0 = [0b0010-0000] #I2C device address for bmi150 magnetometer MAG_IF_1 = [0b1000-0000] = [manual_en(7), reserved, mag_offset(5:2), mag_rd_burst(1:0) MAG_IF_2 = BMI150 register to read MAG_IF_3 = BMI150 register to write to MAG_IF_4 = Data to write to BMI150
